text: @realDonaldTrump Better look into these states wanting billions of dollars and why.  Wisconsin, Evers, wants $2 billion.  FOR WHAT?  Evers is keeping all the restaurants and bars closed until the end of May.  He's an idiot.  https://t.co/xrxKM72FJB
